verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father, we love You, we worship and adore You,
Glorify Your name in all the Earth!
Glorify Your name, glorify Your name,
Glorify Your name in all the Earth!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus, we love You, we worship and adore You ...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Spirit, we love You we worship and adore You ...
